lead_paragraph: Earlier this year I wrote a story about the enigmatic world of cybersecurity, where "white hat" hackers work with corporations to find flaws in computer systems, in the hope of fending off "black hat" hackers who try to take advantage of these vulnerabilities.
snippet: Google expands a rewards program that is designed to compensate hackers who find security flaws in the company's products.
abstract: Google expands a rewards program that is designed to compensate hackers who find security flaws in the company's products.
